titleStmt.title: Declaratio, serenissimi potentissimique principis Caroli, Magnæ Britanniæ &c. regis vltra--marinis Protestantium ecclesiis transmissa.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

notesStmt.note: Text in Latin, English, and French.
Not in fact an Oxford imprint, but a carelessly printed London edition--cf. Madan, II, 1672.
Dated at end of Latin text: Dat; in academia & civitate nostra Oxoniensi pridie Idus maij 1644.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
